converse.line: Hi?

random.line: Look out, we're being invaded! Hang on to your hat, we're being raided!
And Captain Capricorn, that's who's behind it. If nothing's there to find, you know he'll find it.
Counting again and again from one to nine. Approaching and pushing away infinity. Oh sweet absurdity!
But if you prefer that old silly number zero.
You'll become a master of doing nothing, being nothing.
Okay, you're Miss Illusion. Smiling in all this confusion. Because you're young today, tomorrow you start to play.
What do you believe? Why do you believe it? Don't ya ever wonder... If it's really true...
Look up in the air, the Octave Doctor's there! And when he strokes his gong. Your middle eye comes on!
I see you sittin' there on your old back veranda. You shady lady and waltzing Matilda. You're really only me if you'd only remember.

converse.line: Bye!
(Prepare thine self, Emere.) I need a favor from you guys. Do you make magical essence?
Sitting up there in your ivory city. Look so ugly and you feel so pretty. You hear me. But I don't see you. You feel me. One day I'll be you.
Hey! That sounds like you are insulting me.
I'd just like to say, waves that you ride. Just to bolster your pride.
But if it's love that you're after. The craft of a hero. Banana, nirvana, ma√±ana.
Then when you're receiving. Perceiving your telepathic powers.
(Bring us a magical pinecone, then we'll talk.)
Ah! You guys can understand me? And use telepathy? Whoa. The power of magic is incredible.
You're born on this Planet now to help to show the way. To stop the spread of darkness and to sing the Golden Age.
I assume that means you trust me? Okay.
Well mirror, mirror on the wall. Who's the biggest fool of all?
Hallucinating freedom calls. What's freedom babe? You don't know!
Alright! I'm trying to find your stupid pinecone.
What a surprise! She looked in the cupboard. And found the eyes in the suitcase!
You're welcome. Here. Take it. Can I have the essence now, please?
Maybe you're here for the giggle.
Maybe you're into the puzzle.
Maybe you're blowing the bubble.
Maybe you're all in a muddle.
(Why are they dancing? Is it part of making the essence? Boy, this is weird.)
You are my Magick Brother. You are the one in love.
You are my Mystic Sister. You are the one in love.

Master Builder, tell me how you make a temple? Tools and moon stones, You don't really need them, you know... Master Builder, tell me what the temple's made of? Deep inside you, you can build an invisible temple in your own imagination.
Whose are these words I sing and what does my guitar sing? This is not me, I am not this. I'm only passing.

Open up the veil and let us take a peep in, through the moon and diving deep we'll meet the whale where rides the captain's submarine. Who told the tale of pixies green that sends us kisses in the brain and out-far planets never seen except by technicolor dream.
(Ooooooh. Colors. Images. Sounds. Flying teapots. Angels' Eggs. I see it all.)
What's that in the sky now? Teapots that can fly now. Voices in your head. Tell me what they said.
You're aquaman and in your hand is a watering can I now can believe it to be. The fun gods winking and we're all blinking and thinking we're sinking in the sea.
Everything you think shows. Hanging round your head. Underneath your long hair. Tell me what you feel there.
It's too easy. Just to change your face. It's too easy. Just to change your place. You feel so cool.
The light gets stronger and all our eyes look yonder to see what's going on. But that's all right you'll soon be out.
And everything we made, a flicker of light and shade. A body to wander by. A whistle of sound and sigh.
I could swear that I saw it up in the sky. It was green as an emerald in the blue. Now I'm wondering if it was really you.
Our brothers' hand. I'm happy to say that we have already won.
(...Where am I? Oh, right!) Uhhhh. What did you guys do to me!?
Earth mother, soul sister be high here now.
Bad weather hell for leather. Now and zen you goof again.
I'm tired of your nonsense! I'm out!

random.line: Wake up my friend. We must act now. We've waited too long.
For peace and Love, we've waited too long.
So there goes Zero the Hero. Turning on around the wheel of births and deaths. And meanwhile the Octave Doctors--
Oh no, give a dog a bone. Don't come thinkin' through the door.
Well help me help me sing this song. I want to stay living for much too long.
Well man you must be dead.
